thread.title: Samsung India cuts 90 jobs layoffs planned
thread.title_full: Samsung India cuts 90 jobs layoffs planned

title: Samsung India cuts 90 jobs layoffs planned
text:
Samsung India cuts 90 jobs, layoffs planned 
Times of India Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
• Samsung is likely to lay off almost 5% of its staff in India 
• A total of 750 to 1,000 employees set to lose their jobs unless their performance improves 
• About 35 of those being asked to leave are in the grade of general manager and higher 
...
